description.value:
[Slotless]

Effect To celebrate your success as a Pathfinder agent, Janira gave you a compass lid engraved with your name and a Glyph of the Open Road, symbol of the Pathfinder Society. You can attach this lid to any @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Compass]{Compass}, including a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wayfinder]{Wayfinder}, to personalize it.
